name: Mini Boxing: Champion King
description:
Mini Boxing: Champion King developed especially for punch boxing fighting lovers and kick fighting lovers from all over the world, now play & enjoy your favorite hero punch boxing game any time on your device. A punch boxing super stars career challenges will drive your dwarf to take risky shots in the ring. So get ready and start real super star fighting match tournament with this ultimate kid’s world punch boxing champion’s game.
• Fight against toughest martial arts fighters and become world champion
• World professional punch boxers in fighting tournament
• Ultimate world action packed muay Thai punch boxing game
• Face different punch boxing & kick boxing rivals with pro fighting techniques
